title: The Difference of the case, between the separation of Protestants from the Church of Rome, and the separation of Dissenters from the Church of England
author: Clagett, William, 1646-1688.
publisher: Printed for Thomas Basset ... and Fincham Gardiner ...,
notes: Written by W. Clagett. Cf. DNB; NUC pre-1956; Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Also attributed to John Williams. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
